concept.description: Marks all types in main directories with label Main
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(t:Java:Type) WHERE a.fileName CONTAINS "/java/main" SET t:Main RETURN count(t.fqn)

concept.description: Marks all packages in main directories with label Main
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(p:Java:Package) WHERE a.fileName CONTAINS '/java/main' SET p:Main RETURN p.fqn

concept.description: Labels all classes with an immutable state as "Immutable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (immutable:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(field:Field), (accessorMethod)-[:WRITES]->(field) WHERE field.visibility = 'private' WITH immutable, collect(accessorMethod) as accessorMethods WHERE all (accessorMethod in accessorMethods where accessorMethod:Constructor) SET immutable:Immutable RETURN immutable as Immutable
